long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of wading through endless life stories and intrusive ads just to find the recipe?

Introducing Tidy Recipe, your ultimate recipe companion that seamlessly declutters recipe websites, presenting you with a clean and concise recipe in a handy sidebar. Ditch the distractions and get straight to the cooking with Tidy Recipe!

Key Features:

Clarity at your fingertips: Tidy Recipe automatically extracts the core recipe information, eliminating irrelevant fluff and distractions. We even use a little A.I. secret sauce to discover cuisines, categories and idets that may no be listed in the original recipe.

Recipe organization made easy: Save and organize your favorite recipes, with your own tags, in a single, organized library, accessible from anywhere on the Tidy Recipe website.

Print your culinary masterpieces: Effortlessly print any recipe, ensuring you have a handy guide while cooking.

Say goodbye to recipe frustration and embrace culinary simplicity with Tidy Recipe!

Install Tidy Recipe today and experience the effortless joy of recipe discovery.
